description:
* Based on a light novel series of the same name by http://anidb.net/cr17862 [Fushimi Tsukasa], illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr17314 [Kanzaki Hiro].
http://anidb.net/ch17524 [Kousaka Kyousuke], a normal seventeen-year-old high school student, has not gotten along with his fourteen-year-old sister, http://anidb.net/ch17525 [Kirino], in years. For longer than he can remember, Kirino has ignored him entirely and even abused him. It seemed their relationship would continue this way forever.
In what might have otherwise been just another day, however, he happens to find a DVD case for a http://anidb.net/t2503 [mahou shoujo] anime by the title of Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru (Stardust Witch Meruru) in his house`s entranceway. He mentally inspects every member of his household as potential owners, but discards everyone as impossible cases. Upon carelessly checking the case contents, he is startled to find inside the case not the corresponding DVD, but instead an adult game called Imouto to Koi Shiyo! (Make Love with Little Sister!). Determined to find out the owner of the goods, Kyousuke brings Meruru up at the family dinner table in a roundabout manner. His parents react very negatively towards the subject, especially http://anidb.net/ch22010 [his father], a policeman with a firm personality and a prejudice against anime fans. Kirino, on the other hand, abruptly ends her meal and disappears into her bedroom. Concluding the box could only be hers, Kyousuke decides to bring the truth out of her.
In the dead of the night, Kirino violently wakes her brother up to talk to him, a completely unprecedented event. She drags him into her room and shows him a massive collection of cute girl-centered anime, manga and visual novels, a large share of which are adult games featuring young girls acting cute towards fictional older brothers, who are in fact the player. Kyousuke is taken aback, but now that Kirino has shared her secret with him, he is part of it, and there is no going back. He is about to be forcefully dragged into his sister`s life, in a way he certainly neither expected nor would have chosen had he been given the chance.
— written by Hinoe

REGULAR.description: After bumping into his little sister, Kirino, in the hall, Kyousuke finds a magical girl anime DVD containing a little-sister themed adult game inside. Kyousuke soon learns the game belongs to Kirino and confronts her about it, though says she would not be weird for having such a hobby. Later that night, Kirino brings Kyousuke into her room where she reveals her secret stash of erotic games, and asks him for "life counseling".

titles.title: Impossible de tomber amoureux de ma petite sœur
No es posible que me enamore de mi hermana
Ore ga Imouto to Koi o Suru Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way I Could Love My Sister
俺が妹と恋をするわけがない

REGULAR.description: Noticing Kirino has no one to share her hobbies with, Kyousuke asks for advice from his friend, Manami Tamura, who suggests that she make some otaku friends. Kirino joins an on-line community and is invited to an otaku tea party at a maid café in Akihabara.

titles.title: Je n`irai pas avec ma petite soeur dans ces réunions IRL
No es posible que vaya a un meeting con mi hermana
Ore ga Imouto to Off-Kai ni Iku Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way I`d Go to an IRL Meetup with My Sister
俺が妹とオフ会に行くわけがない

REGULAR.description: Kirino`s father learns of her hobby and becomes angry at her. Kirino becomes upset that her hobby has been called "worthless" and runs off, prompting Kyousuke to catch up with her. After seeing Kirino show no desire to give up a part of her life, Kyousuke decides to actively support Kirino.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être aussi mignonne
No es posible que mi hermana sea tan linda
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Be This Cute
俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない

REGULAR.description: While Kirino has her school friends over, she receives a package from Saori, unaware it is a collection of otaku goods, forcing Kyousuke to stop her from opening it in front of her regular friends, but his attempts to protect it from her land them in an even more awkward situation. As way of apology for the incident, Kirino forces Kyousuke to take her to Summer Comiket, along with Saori and Kuroneko.

titles.title: Je n`irai pas au Comiket d`été avec ma petite sœur
Ore no Imouto ga Natsu-Comi Toka Iku Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Would Go To Summer Comiket
俺の妹が夏コミとか行くわけがない

REGULAR.description: Ayase puts pressure on Kirino and eventually discovers her hobby, telling her they can`t be friends any longer. Noticing Kirino falling into despair, Kyousuke tries talking to Ayase who cannot accept her friend`s hobby having seen reports of crimes relating to adult game. When all else fails, Kyousuke decides to take drastic measures.

titles.title: La meilleure amie de ma petite sœur n`est pas aussi coincée que ça ?
Ore no Imouto no Shin`yuu ga Konna ni XX na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister`s Friend Can Be This XX
俺の妹の親友がこんなに××なわけがない

REGULAR.description: Manami invites Kyousuke over to her house to try out some sweets made by her family`s shop for a Halloween event. Her family consider these childhood friends kind of a married couple already, and Manami`s grandpa tricks them into sharing the same room that night.

titles.title: Mon amie d`enfance ne peut pas être aussi mignonne
Ore no Osananajimi ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Childhood Friend Can Be This Cute
俺の幼馴染がこんなに可愛いわけがない

REGULAR.description: Having read Kuroneko`s fan fiction online, Kirino decides to write some of her own. But in order to get material, and get into the right mood for writing, she drags Kyousuke around the city on Christmas Eve... but this isn`t a date, right?

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être une aussi bonne écrivaine
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Shousetsuka na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Write a Novel
俺の妹がこんなに小説家なわけがない

REGULAR.description: Kirino`s novel is flying off the shelves, and even getting an anime! But when Kirino dreams of getting her favorite stars for staff, and every last detail being perfect, the anime producers` goal is more mundane: Making money.

titles.title: Le roman de ma petite sœur ne peut pas devenir un anime
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Anime-ka na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Could Get an Anime
俺の妹がこんなにアニメ化なわけがない

REGULAR.description: A day in the life of all characters: Kirino playing the latest eroge (loudly!), Kyousuke suffering from this, Kuroneko actually having family life, and Saori... well, she has quite a secret of her own.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être fan de ce genre d`eroge
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Eroge Sanmai na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Play Eroge Like This
俺の妹がこんなにエロゲー三昧なわけがない

REGULAR.description: Ayase wants to give Kirino a present that the otaku would be happy about, and asks Kyousuke for help. After brainstorming with Saori and Kuroneko the three get a great idea for a present that Kirino would love; unfortunately it`s not for sale but the prize for a cosplay event of Kirino`s favorite anime! Ayase gets furious over the suggestion of her participating in this competition... but then she has an idea.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas porter ce genre de cosplay
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Cosplay na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Cosplay Like This
俺の妹がこんなにコスプレなわけがない

REGULAR.description: When shopping for lunch, Kyousuke meets Manami and invites her to cook for him when his parents are away. Kirino doesn`t like it and makes the event a living hell for both. Some time later, Kyousuke gets an invitation from Saori to a special event; arriving there he`s welcomed by his "personal harem", consisting of Saori, Kuroneko, and Kirino... in maid costumes.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être une servante
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Maid na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Be a Maid
俺の妹がこんなにメイドなわけがない

REGULAR.description: Kirino suddenly is really nice to Kyousuke, and then asks him to do a last "life counseling" for him, by buying an eroge for her when it`s on sale - at midnight in Akihabara. But the real problems for Kyousuke begin when Kirino asks him to play the game together.

titles.title: Les conseils pour ma petite soeur ne peuvent se finir ainsi
Ore no Imouto no Jinsei Soudan ga Kore de Owaru Wake ga Nai: Good End
There`s No Way My Little Sister`s Life Advice Can End Like This (Good End)
俺の妹の人生相談がこれで終わるわけがない GOOD END♡
Les conseils pour ma petite soeur ne peuvent se finir ainsi (True Route)
Ore no Imouto no Jinsei Soudan ga Kore de Owaru Wake ga Nai: True Route
There`s No Way My Little Sister`s Life Advice Can End Like This (True Route)
俺の妹の人生相談がこれで終わるわけがない TRUE ROUTE

SPECIAL.description: Kuroneko (real name: Gokou Ruri) enrolls in Kyousuke`s school, and Saori feels downhearted that she hasn`t heard from Kirino. Kyousuke notices that Ruri is having trouble making friends due to her personality, so he decides they should try a membership at their school`s Games Research club where the boy meets two other persons he never expected to be there as well.

titles.title: Ma disciple ne peut pas être aussi pourrie
Ore no Kouhai ga Konna ni Kusatteru Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Kouhai Can Be This Rotten
俺の後輩がこんなに腐ってるわけがない

SPECIAL.description: With Sena and Kuroneko constantly quarreling in the Games Development club, the club president decides they`ll have to write a game together and submit it to an online contest. Both girls have different concepts about the game`s theme, so they`ll both present them to the club whose members will then decide by majority vote whose concept will have to be implemented. And Kyousuke, with no programming skills thus acting as supervisor for the team, suggests to write an eroge - in order to have less competition and a better chance to win the contest.

titles.title: Ma disciple ne peut pas être aussi mignonne
Ore no Kouhai ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Kouhai Can Be This Cute
俺の後輩がこんなに可愛いわけがない

SPECIAL.description: As Ruri and Sena`s game is bashed on the Internet they decide to work harder towards making a better game. As Kyousuke prepares to go home he receives a text message from Kirino telling him to throw away her collection of eroge and anime goods! Kyousuke contacts Ayase who confirms Kirino hasn`t been in contact with her since she left either. Kyousuke then meets up with Ruri who encourages him to fly to America to find the root of Kirino`s problem - and before the boy leaves she puts a special jinx on him.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas avoir un final comme ça !
Ore no Imouto ga Kore de Saishuukai na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way This Is My Little Sister`s Last Episode
俺の妹がこれで最終回なわけがない

Mijn Zusje kan Onmogelijk zo Schattig zijn
Ore no Imoto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai (saison 1)
